data.name: textBox_xmlViewer.Text
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- ================================================================================ This program causes the robot to drive to from the middle drive to the left or the right.
- drive forward
- if switch is left turn -60 - drive forward to switch - deposit cargo
- if switch is right turn 60 - drive forward to switch - deposit cargo
- stop
================================================================================ --> <Program name="Mid to Sw + Box">
<!-- ============================================================================= Program Steps and Actions... ============================================================================= -->
<!---------------------------///Preparation///-------------------------------- -->
<Step id="Preparation" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="Preparation_A2" parent="Preparation" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<!---------------------------///START///-------------------------------------- -->
<Step id="DriveForward" entry="true" exit="false"> <Action id="snapshot_A1" parent="DriveForward" classname="InitialGyroSnapshot"> </Action> <Action id="DriveForward_A2" parent="DriveForward" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">1.0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="CHECK_SWITCH_LOCATION" entry="false" exit="false"> </Step>
<!--Switch LEFT//////////////-------------------------------------------------------------- -->
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTo_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTo_L_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTo_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveDiag_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveDiag_L_A1" parent="DriveDiag_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">1.0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_L_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<!--//// Drive Up Slower ///// -->
<Step id="DriveToSwitchFast_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveToSwitchFast_L_A1" parent="DriveToSwitchFast_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">1.0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveToSwitchSlow_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveToSwitchSlow_L_A1" parent="DriveToSwitchSlow_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.5</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="LaunchCargo_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="LaunchCargo_L_A1" parent="LaunchCargo_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.5</param> <param id="ramp_enabled">1</param> <param id="driver_shoot">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<!--//// PART 2 L ///// -->
<Step id="DriveBack_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveBack_L_A1" parent="DriveBack_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">-0.9</param> <param id="ramp_enabled">0</param> <param id="driver_shoot">0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_L_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveAwayDiag_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveAwayDiag_L_A1" parent="DriveAwayDiag_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">-0.9</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_L" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_L_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_L" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <param id="collector_enabled">1</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">0.6</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">-0.7</param> </Action> </Step>
<!--Switch RIGHT/////////----------------------------------------------------------------------- -->
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTo_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTo_R_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTo_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveDiag_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveDiag_R_A1" parent="DriveDiag_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">1.0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_R_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<!--//// Drive Up Slower ///// -->
<Step id="DriveToSwitchFast_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveToSwitchFast_R_A1" parent="DriveToSwitchFast_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">1.0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveToSwitchSlow_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveToSwitchSlow_R_A1" parent="DriveToSwitchSlow_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.5</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="LaunchCargo_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="LaunchCargo_R_A1" parent="LaunchCargo_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.5</param> <param id="ramp_enabled">1</param> <param id="driver_shoot">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<!--//// PART 2 R ///// -->
<Step id="DriveBack_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveBack_R_A1" parent="DriveBack_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">-1.0</param> <param id="ramp_enabled">0</param> <param id="driver_shoot">0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_R_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveAwayDiag_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveAwayDiag_R_A1" parent="DriveAwayDiag_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">-1.0</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_R" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_R_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_R" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <param id="collector_enabled">1</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">0.6</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">-0.7</param> </Action> </Step>
<!-------------------------------///STOP///------------------------------------------ -->
<Step id="ExtendArms" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ExtendArms_A1" parent="ExtendArms" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.0</param> <param id="collector_enabled">1</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">0.6</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">-0.7</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveToCube" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveToCube_A1" parent="DriveToCube" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">-0.7</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">0.4</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">-0.4</param> <param id="collector_intake_r">1</param> <param id="collector_intake_l">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="GrabCube" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="GrabCube_A1" parent="GrabCube" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.0</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">-0.4</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">0.5</param> <param id="collector_intake_r">1</param> <param id="collector_intake_l">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="DriveAway" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="DriveAway_A1" parent="DriveAway" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.6</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">-0.4</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">0.5</param> <param id="collector_intake_r">1</param> <param id="collector_intake_l">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="ZeroPointTurnToStop" entry="false" exit="false"> <Action id="ZeroPointTurnToStop_A1" parent="ZeroPointTurnToStop" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">1</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">-0.3</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">0.4</param> <param id="collector_intake_r">1</param> <param id="collector_intake_l">1</param> </Action> </Step>
<Step id="Stop" entry="false" exit="true"> <Action id="Stop_A1" parent="Stop" classname="OIDataFaker"> <param id="drivebase_enabled">1</param> <!-- THROTTLE VALUES GO NEGATIVE FOR FORWARDS --> <param id="drivebase_throttle">0.0</param> <param id="drivebase_turbo_button">0</param> <param id="drivebase_heading">0.0</param> <param id="right_collector_arm">0</param> <param id="left_collector_arm">0</param> <param id="collector_intake_l">0</param> <param id="collector_intake_r">0</param> <param id="drivebase_anti_turbo_button">0</param> <param id="driver_shoot">0</param> </Action> </Step>
<!-- ============================================================================= Conditions... ============================================================================= -->
<!--------------------------///Preparation///-------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="C0" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="SliderControlledTimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="slider_number">0</param> </Condition>
<!---------------------------///START///---------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="C1" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C1_DistanceDriven" parent="C1" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">3</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-75</param> <param id="right_ticks">-75</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C1_TimeElapsed" parent="C1" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">4.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!--------------------------///Primary Decisions///----------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="switch_Is_Right" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="BooleanTester"> <param id="ifthis">switch_location</param> <param id="target">true</param> <param id="store">mirror</param> </Condition>
<Condition id="switch_Is_Left" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="BooleanTester"> <param id="ifthis">switch_location</param> <param id="target">false</param> <param id="store">mirror</param> </Condition>
<!---------------------------///TO SWITCH LEFT///---------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="C0L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C0L_spin" parent="C0L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">-45.0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">20</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">6.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C0L_TimeElapsed" parent="C0L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C1L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C1L_DistanceDriven" parent="C1L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">-45</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">20</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-700</param> <param id="right_ticks">-700</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C1L_TimeElapsed" parent="C1L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">4.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C2L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C2L_spin" parent="C2L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">20</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">5.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C2L_TimeElapsed" parent="C2L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!--//// Drive Up Slower ///// -->
<Condition id="C3L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C3L_DistanceDriven" parent="C3L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-180</param> <param id="right_ticks">-180</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C3L_TimeElapsed" parent="C3L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C4L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C4L_DistanceDriven" parent="C4L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-400</param> <param id="right_ticks">-400</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C4L_TimeElapsed" parent="C4L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C5L" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition>
<!--//// PART 2 L ///// -->
<Condition id="C6L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C6L_DistanceDriven" parent="C6L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">400</param> <param id="right_ticks">400</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C6L_TimeElapsed" parent="C6L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C7L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C7L_spin" parent="C7L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">-60</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">6.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C7L_TimeElapsed" parent="C7L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C8L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C8L_DistanceDriven" parent="C8L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">-60</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">450</param> <param id="right_ticks">450</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C8L_TimeElapsed" parent="C8L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!---------------------------///TO SWITCH RIGHT///---------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="C0R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C0R_spin" parent="C0R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">45.0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">6.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C0R_TimeElapsed" parent="C0R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C1R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C1R_DistanceDriven" parent="C1R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">45</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">20</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-500</param> <param id="right_ticks">-500</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C1R_TimeElapsed" parent="C1R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">4.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C2R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C2R_spin" parent="C2R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">6.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C2R_TimeElapsed" parent="C2R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!--//// Drive Up Slower ///// -->
<Condition id="C3R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C3R_DistanceDriven" parent="C3R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-180</param> <param id="right_ticks">-180</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C3R_TimeElapsed" parent="C3R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C4R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C4R_DistanceDriven" parent="C4R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-400</param> <param id="right_ticks">-400</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C4R_TimeElapsed" parent="C4R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C5R" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition>
<!--//// PART 2 R ///// -->
<Condition id="C6R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C6R_DistanceDriven" parent="C6R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">400</param> <param id="right_ticks">400</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C6R_TimeElapsed" parent="C6R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C7R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C7R_spin" parent="C7R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">60</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.7</param> <param id="heading">0.8</param> <param id="deadband">6.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C7R_TimeElapsed" parent="C7R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C8R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C8R_DistanceDriven" parent="C8R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">60</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">370</param> <param id="right_ticks">370</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C8R_TimeElapsed" parent="C8R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!--------------------------///Line Up///----------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="CENTER_R" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="CENTER_R_spin" parent="CENTER_R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">180</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">50</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.6</param> <param id="heading">0.7</param> <param id="deadband">5.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="CENTER_R_TimeElapsed" parent="CENTER_R" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="CENTER_L" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="CENTER_L_spin" parent="CENTER_L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">-180</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">50</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.6</param> <param id="heading">0.7</param> <param id="deadband">5.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="CENTER_L_TimeElapsed" parent="CENTER_L" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!--------------------------///Grab Cube///----------------------------------------------- -->
<Condition id="C01" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">1.0</param> </Condition>
<Condition id="C02" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C02_DistanceDriven" parent="C02" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">180</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">500</param> <param id="right_ticks">500</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C02_TimeElapsed" parent="C02" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">3.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C03" parent="NULL" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">0.2</param> </Condition>
<Condition id="C04" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C04_DistanceDriven" parent="C04" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="DriveStraightWithEncodersCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">180</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">10</param> <param id="heading">0.5</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.2</param> <param id="angle_deadband">0</param> <param id="heading_oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> <param id="left_encoder_si_name">LEFT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="right_encoder_si_name">RIGHT_DRIVE_ENCODER</param> <param id="left_ticks">-200</param> <param id="right_ticks">-200</param> <param id="enc_selection">SELECT_EITHER_ENCODER</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C04_TimeElapsed" parent="C04" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">2.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<Condition id="C05" parent="NULL" type="Composite" operation="OR" classname="CompositeCondition"> <Condition id="C05_spin" parent="C05" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="RotatedByAnglePreciseCondition"> <param id="sweep_angle">0</param> <param id="slowdown_angle">50</param> <param id="minimum_heading">0.6</param> <param id="heading">0.7</param> <param id="deadband">5.0</param> <param id="oi_name">drivebase_heading</param> </Condition> <Condition id="C05_TimeElapsed" parent="C05" type="Unary" operation="NULL" classname="TimeElapsedCondition"> <param id="wait_time">3.0</param> </Condition> </Condition>
<!-- ============================================================================= Transitions... ============================================================================= -->
<!--------------------------///Preparation///----------------------------------------------- --> <Transition id="T0" fromstep="Preparation" tostep="DriveForward" condition="C0"/>
<!---------------------------///Start///---------------------------------------------- --> <Transition id="T1" fromstep="DriveForward" tostep="CHECK_SWITCH_LOCATION" condition="C1"/>
<!----------------------------///Primary Decisions///--------------------------------------------- --> <Transition id="T2" fromstep="CHECK_SWITCH_LOCATION" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTo_L" condition="switch_Is_Left"/> <Transition id="T3" fromstep="CHECK_SWITCH_LOCATION" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTo_R" condition="switch_Is_Right"/>
<!-----------------------------///TO SWITCH LEFT///-------------------------------------------- --> <Transition id="T4" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTo_L" tostep="DriveDiag_L" condition="C0L"/> <Transition id="T5" fromstep="DriveDiag_L" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_L" condition="C1L"/> <Transition id="T6" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_L" tostep="DriveToSwitchFast_L" condition="C2L"/>
<Transition id="T7" fromstep="DriveToSwitchFast_L" tostep="DriveToSwitchSlow_L" condition="C3L"/> <Transition id="T8" fromstep="DriveToSwitchSlow_L" tostep="LaunchCargo_L" condition="C4L"/> <Transition id="T9" fromstep="LaunchCargo_L" tostep="DriveBack_L" condition="C5L"/>
<!--//// PART 2 L ///// -->
<Transition id="T10" fromstep="DriveBack_L" tostep="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_L" condition="C6L"/> <Transition id="T11" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_L" tostep="DriveAwayDiag_L" condition="C7L"/> <Transition id="T12" fromstep="DriveAwayDiag_L" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_R" condition="C8L"/> <Transition id="T13" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_R" tostep="ExtendArms" condition="CENTER_L"/>
<!-----------------------------///TO SWITCH RIGHT///-------------------------------------------- --> <Transition id="T16" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTo_R" tostep="DriveDiag_R" condition="C0R"/> <Transition id="T17" fromstep="DriveDiag_R" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_R" condition="C1R"/> <Transition id="T18" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTowardSwitch_R" tostep="DriveToSwitchFast_R" condition="C2R"/>
<Transition id="T19" fromstep="DriveToSwitchFast_R" tostep="DriveToSwitchSlow_R" condition="C3R"/> <Transition id="T20" fromstep="DriveToSwitchSlow_R" tostep="LaunchCargo_R" condition="C4R"/> <Transition id="T21" fromstep="LaunchCargo_R" tostep="DriveBack_R" condition="C5R"/>
<!--//// PART 2 R ///// -->
<Transition id="T22" fromstep="DriveBack_R" tostep="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_R" condition="C6R"/> <Transition id="T23" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnAwayFromSwitch_R" tostep="DriveAwayDiag_R" condition="C7R"/> <Transition id="T24" fromstep="DriveAwayDiag_R" tostep="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_L" condition="C8R"/> <Transition id="T25" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnTowardBox_L" tostep="ExtendArms" condition="CENTER_R"/>
<Transition id="T26" fromstep="ExtendArms" tostep="DriveToCube" condition="C01"/> <Transition id="T27" fromstep="DriveToCube" tostep="GrabCube" condition="C02"/> <Transition id="T28" fromstep="GrabCube" tostep="DriveAway" condition="C03"/> <Transition id="T29" fromstep="DriveAway" tostep="ZeroPointTurnToStop" condition="C04"/> <Transition id="T30" fromstep="ZeroPointTurnToStop" tostep="Stop" condition="C05"/>
</Program>
